argumentText:
ARGUMENT
w

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_equequ2 | |- ( w = y -> ( z = w <-> z = y ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_dvelimv | |- ( -. A. x x = y -> ( z = y -> A. x z = y ) ) |
\
 Alternate proof of ~ dveeq2 , shorter but requiring ~ ax-11 . (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-2002.)  (Revised by NM, 20-Jul-2015.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
